change.changenote: Regulation BEFORE repealed by BC Reg 59/2008, effective March 17, 2008.

reg.title: Rule 44-801 Implementing National Instrument 44-101 Short Form Prospectus Distributions
reg.amsincluded: [includes amendments up to B.C. Reg. 369/2005, December 30, 2005]

paragraph.paragraphtext: NI 44-101 means National Instrument 44-101 Short Form Prospectus Distributions;
a term that is defined or interpreted in the Act has the meaning ascribed to it in the Act.

section.subsandwich: The exemptions established under this Rule are in addition to those established under NI 44-101.

section.marginalnote: Preliminary Short Form Prospectus and Short Form Prospectus
section.subsandwich: Sections 68 and 69 of the Act do not apply to a distribution of securities made in compliance with NI 44-101.

subsection.subsectiontext: Sections 111, 112, 114, 118 and 119 of the Securities Rules do not apply to a distribution of securities made in compliance with NI 44-101.

section.subsandwich: Section 120 (3) (d) of the Securities Rules does not apply to a distribution of securities made in compliance with NI 44-101.

content.provisionsnote: [Provisions of the Securities Act, R.S.B.C. 1996, c. 418, relevant to the enactment of this regulation: section 184]
